title: Patient-Reported Symptom Assessment and Early Chemotherapy Discontinuation in ... - medRxiv

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: Completing assessments reduced early discontinuation risk by 30%, from 33% to 22%.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate automated day-3 reminders to boost assessment completion rates.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸŸ¡ NOTABLE]**: Increasing adoption of PROs in clinical trials as regulatory pressure rises.
**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias could limit generalizability of findings to sicker patient populations.
